```{r}
library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
library(osmdata)
```


```{r}

bars = opq(bbox = c(4.475037,52.148902,4.513608,52.168211)) %>%
    add_osm_feature(key = 'amenity', value = 'pub')%>%
    osmdata_sf ()

streets = opq(bbox = c(4.475037,52.148902,4.513608,52.168211)) %>%
    add_osm_feature(key = 'highway', value = 'residential')%>%
    osmdata_sf ()

canals = opq(bbox =  c(4.475037,52.148902,4.513608,52.168211)) %>%
    add_osm_feature(key = 'waterway', value = 'canal')%>%
    osmdata_sf ()



```

```{r}
ggplot() + 
  geom_sf(data = streets$osm_lines) + 
  geom_sf(data = canals$osm_lines, color = 'lightblue', lwd = 2) + 
  geom_sf(data = bars$osm_points, color = 'red') + 
  coord_sf(xlim = c(4.475037,4.513608), ylim = c(52.148902,52.168211)) + 
  theme_void()
```
